page.title: 10ST.IVES SEPTEMBER FESTIVAL.
page.content: St.Ives Festival has been held in early September for the past 8 years. It runs for about two weeks and presents a wide cross section of activities, such as concerts, poetry readings, recitals, lectures, dances, and exhibitions.{Music}ranges from madrigals to reggae, and{dance companies from ballet to breakdance. Visual{arts}include studio open days (harking back to the earlier days of the artists colony). Childrens events involve street{theatre},clowns and painting competitions. Local talent as well as more well known artistes perform each year adding a lift to the end of a busy holiday season, and attracting both resident and tourist alike.
